tasks.name: Process Discovery
tasks.description: Identify and document existing business processes using process discovery techniques
tasks.ruDescription: Выявление и документирование существующих бизнес-процессов с использованием методов обнаружения процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: All key processes are identified and documented

tasks.name: Process Mapping As-Is
tasks.description: Create detailed as-is process maps to visualize current processes
tasks.ruDescription: Создание детальных карт текущих процессов для визуализации существующих процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: As-is process maps are created and validated with stakeholders

tasks.name: Process Performance Analysis
tasks.description: Analyze current process performance metrics and identify bottlenecks
tasks.ruDescription: Анализ метрик производительности текущих процессов и выявление узких мест
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Performance metrics are established and bottlenecks identified

tasks.name: Root Cause Analysis
tasks.description: Identify root causes of process inefficiencies and opportunities for improvement
tasks.ruDescription: Выявление коренных причин неэффективности процессов и возможностей для улучшения
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Root causes are identified and documented

tasks.name: Current State Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation of the current state processes
tasks.ruDescription: Создание исчерпывающей документации о процессах текущего состояния
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Current state documentation is complete and approved

tasks.name: Process Redesign Workshop
tasks.description: Conduct workshops to redesign key processes based on analysis
tasks.ruDescription: Проведение семинаров по редизайну ключевых процессов на основе анализа
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Process redesign workshops completed with key stakeholders

tasks.name: Process Mapping To-Be
tasks.description: Create detailed to-be process maps for the future state
tasks.ruDescription: Создание детальных карт целевых процессов для будущего состояния
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: To-be process maps are created and approved

tasks.name: Process Automation Opportunities
tasks.description: Identify opportunities for process automation and technology integration
tasks.ruDescription: Выявление возможностей для автоматизации процессов и интеграции технологий
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Automation opportunities are identified and documented

tasks.name: Future State Performance Modeling
tasks.description: Model expected performance improvements based on redesigned processes
tasks.ruDescription: Моделирование ожидаемого улучшения производительности на основе перепроектированных процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Future state performance models are created and validated

tasks.name: Implementation Roadmap
tasks.description: Develop a detailed implementation roadmap for process changes
tasks.ruDescription: Разработка детальной дорожной карты внедрения изменений процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Implementation roadmap is complete and approved

tasks.name: Implementation Planning
tasks.description: Develop detailed implementation plans for process changes
tasks.ruDescription: Разработка детальных планов внедрения изменений процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Implementation plans are complete and approved

tasks.name: Change Management Strategy
tasks.description: Develop a change management strategy to support process changes
tasks.ruDescription: Разработка стратегии управления изменениями для поддержки изменений процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Change management strategy is complete and approved

tasks.name: Process Documentation Updates
tasks.description: Update process documentation to reflect new processes
tasks.ruDescription: Обновление документации процессов для отражения новых процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Process documentation is updated and approved

tasks.name: Implementation Support
tasks.description: Provide support during implementation of process changes
tasks.ruDescription: Предоставление поддержки во время внедрения изменений процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Implementation support is provided throughout the process change implementation

tasks.name: Performance Monitoring Setup
tasks.description: Set up monitoring systems for new process performance
tasks.ruDescription: Настройка систем мониторинга для производительности новых процессов
tasks.acceptanceCriteria: Performance monitoring systems are set up and operational
